backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend components, hooks, and styles for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions with extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating UI, proposal state, sounds, evasive NO behavior, and celebration flow.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Cele: Full‑screen celebration overlay with darkened background, confetti, and emoji burst.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Emoj: Generates radial burst of floating emojis with randomized angles and delays.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Hear: Creates falling heart confetti pieces with random positions, delays, sizes, and durations.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Moda: Adds sparkles and floating heart outlines as decorative modal accents.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Prop: Timed celebration modal displaying themed visuals and text after YES is clicked.
frontend/src/components/proposal/Evasive: NO button with evasive movement, non-focusability, and interaction handlers preventing activation.
frontend/src/components/proposal/YesButt: Styled YES button triggering acceptance and celebration actions.
frontend/src/components/romance/BeatingH: Animated beating heart emoji with responsive sizing.
frontend/src/components/romance/EmojiRea: Generates floating emoji trails based on pointer movement with throttled spawn rate.
frontend/src/components/romance/Heartbea: Wraps children in a div that applies a heartbeat pulse animation.
frontend/src/components/romance/HeartPar: Renders an animated canvas of drifting heart particles, with dense mode biasing hearts toward the bottom. Handles resizing, drawing, movement, and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicTog: Button that toggles background music playback using useBackgroundMusic, showing play/pause icons.
frontend/src/components/romance/Romantic: Provides a fixed layered romantic gradient background with bokeh effects and subtle glow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Manages a looping background audio element and provides a toggle to play or pause it.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNo.ts: Controls a moving 'No' button that relocates, shrinks, and cycles phrases based on user interaction and timed movement.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useNavigationGuard.ts: Adds a beforeunload warning when shouldWarn is true to prevent accidental navigation away.
frontend/src/hooks/useProposalState.ts: Tracks proposal state in localStorage and exposes helpers to switch between idle, celebrating, and completed.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundEffects.ts: Initializes and plays click and explosion UI sound effects with simple playback helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining romantic-themed color variables, gradients, shadows, and responsive scaling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom color variables, extended themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the Valentine proposal app’s features, architecture notes, existing feature versions, and pending feature requests.
